metaDescription.value: Addresses buying and evaluation questions to help teams assess fit, reduce risk, and understand how metR supports modern documentation and AI initiatives.

documentInfo.metaDescription: Addresses buying and evaluation questions to help teams assess fit, reduce risk, and understand how metR supports modern documentation and AI initiatives.

subHeading.value: Addresses buying and evaluation questions to help teams assess fit, reduce risk, and understand how metR supports modern documentation and AI initiatives.

heading.value: Can I try metR before committing?

content.value: Yes. Most teams start with a pilot or sandbox migration to validate fit and output quality.

heading.value: Is metR a replacement for a CCMS?

content.value: No. metR is CCMS-agnostic and complements existing systems without the cost or complexity of traditional CCMS platforms.

heading.value: How does metR support AI-driven documentation?

content.value: Structured DITA output improves chunking, metadata consistency, and retrieval accuracyâ€”key to effective AI search and chat experiences.

heading.value: Will metR help reduce AI hallucinations?

content.value: Yes. Structured, well-chunked content improves context and retrieval accuracy, reducing hallucinations.

heading.value: Can multiple teams use one metR setup?

content.value: Yes. Multiple projects and controlled access allow teams and products to share one organization securely.
